title: "Isle of Wight" elongated Art Nouveau display face
content:
Hello everybody. I’m new to this site, and if anyone could help me that would be awesome. Does anyone know what font this is from the Isle of Wight flash website?

Below is a screen capture, and it can also be found here: [http://community.isleofwightfestival.com/flash/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202195359/http:/community.isleofwightfestival.com/flash/ "http://community.isleofwightfestival.com/flash/")

Thanks a lot!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202195359im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture-8_4464.gif)

 [‹ (x) "Inklings" retro script logo - custom designed {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202195359/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36976 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) daten werden & fluxism - Gravur Condensed {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202195359/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36989 "Go to next forum topic")
author: somethingbode

comments.content: Sorry I can’t - but if you are looking for something similar try P22’s Arts and Crafts font.
or Reynolds Art Deco by Dieter Steffmann
